header.Text1: Discover why job seekers choose our platform and find your next gig today!
header.headText: Unleash your potential, find your next assignment!
header.subText: Discover a world of opportunities as an employee on our platform. From creative projects to business tasks, find your next success story here. Join us and make your dreams come true!

image.testimonial: The employees are reliable and immediately deployable, which greatly helps us in case of unexpected absences. It gives us the peace of mind and certainty we need to keep the store running smoothly.

content.headText: Easily scale up and down on our On-demand platform for flexible personnel
content.subText: At Junter Platform, we believe in connecting talent and opportunities in an innovative and flexible way. As an on-demand platform for flexible personnel, we help companies and entrepreneurs quickly and efficiently find the right professionals, whether it’s for temporary support or specialized expertise.

features.headText: Discover the power of our app for employees - your springboard to limitless opportunities.
features.subText: With our app, you have direct access to a wide range of jobs, fast payments, and complete freedom in your schedule. Find your next challenge today!

features.name: Quick access to assignments
features.description: Find assignments that match your skills and interests in no time, without endless searching.

features.name: Flexible scheduling
features.description: Manage your own schedule and work whenever it suits you, allowing you to balance work and private life better.

features.name: Diverse clients
features.description: Gain access to a wide range of clients, from startups to large companies, and expand your network and experience.

features.name: Easy communication
features.description: We are available daily from 09:00 to 17:00 in the chat or via WhatsApp for questions, but you can also reach out 24/7 in the various WhatsApp communities.

features.name: Fast payments
features.description: Receive guaranteed payments for your work without hassle or delays.

features.name: Recognition and feedback
features.description: Build a strong reputation by collecting positive reviews and feedback from satisfied clients, increasing your chances of future assignments.

branches.headText: Discover the versatility of our platform for job seekers.
branches.subText: Whether you have a passion for the hospitality of the catering industry, the precision of logistics and transport, or the care of the healthcare sector, our platform offers a diverse range of opportunities.

faqs.headText: Unleash your potential, find your next assignment!

FAQ.question: How can I register as a freelancer on the platform?
FAQ.answer: Simply visit the website or download the app, go through the registration process, and complete your profile with relevant information.

FAQ.question: How are payments processed for completed assignments?
FAQ.answer: After completing an assignment, you will initially receive your payment on the last Friday of the month, but starting in February, payments will be made every Friday.

FAQ.question: Can I set my own rates for the offered services?
FAQ.answer: As a freelancer, you have the freedom to set your own rates based on your experience and market standards.

FAQ.question: What types of assignments are available on the platform?
FAQ.answer: From serving in hospitality to traffic control and stage work at festivals or meal delivery, a variety of assignments are available to choose from.

FAQ.question: Is support available if I need help while using the app?
FAQ.answer: Our team is available every day from 09:00 to 17:00 via the app or WhatsApp to answer any questions.

FAQ.question: How can I optimize my profile to get more assignments?
FAQ.answer: Optimize your profile by adding skills and work experience to attract more assignments.

FAQ.question: How does the process of finding and accepting assignments work?
FAQ.answer: Browse available assignments, check the details, and apply with a single click. It’s fast and intuitive.

FAQ.question: Are there reviews or ratings from clients available for the assignments?
FAQ.answer: Clients can leave reviews after an assignment is completed, helping you build and improve your reputation.

FAQ.question: Are there any requirements I need to meet to accept assignments through the platform?
FAQ.answer: In most cases, minimal experience or skills relevant to the assignment are required.

testimonials.subText: Discover what our users have to say

testimonials.name: Lisa
testimonials.testimonial: Great app for hospitality work! I quickly find shifts at cool restaurants that fit my schedule. Super convenient!

testimonials.name: Ahmed
testimonials.testimonial: As a security professional, I appreciate the quick access to relevant assignments. Great app!

testimonials.name: Maria
testimonials.testimonial: I love the simplicity of this app! It has made my search for cleaning jobs so much easier.

testimonials.name: George
testimonials.testimonial: This platform has simplified my search for transport work. Reliable and efficient!

testimonials.name: Eva
testimonials.testimonial: As a healthcare provider, I appreciate the flexibility of this app. It helps me find suitable care assignments.

testimonials.name: Solomon
testimonials.testimonial: This app has taken my freelance administrative work to the next level. Efficient and user-friendly!

employersPage.title: Junter for businesses
employersPage.subText: Quickly and easily find freelancers or temporary workers for a fixed and non-binding rate

EmployTypes.explanation: Quickly and flexibly find the right professionals for temporary or long-term assignments, without administrative hassle.
Experienced freelancers ready to take your projects to the next level. Flexible, specialized, and available when you need them.
Save time and let us find the perfect candidate for your organization. With our extensive network and expertise, we bring talent and your company together.
Focus on your business while we take care of the employer's responsibilities. With payrolling, you can easily bring in staff.

Benefits.explanation: By choosing our platform, you benefit from a transparent and simple cost model where you only pay for the hours worked by the flex workers you invite. Invite unlimited flex workers starting at £16.50 per hour.

With our platform, almost all the administration is handled for you, so you can focus on what really matters. Our team is ready to assist you and ensure everything runs smoothly so your business can continue to operate efficiently.
Benefits.imageAlt: Save on administrstive work and leave it to us.

Benefits.explanation: With the dashboard, you have a full overview of all your activities. The dashboard gives you insight into posted jobs, responses to jobs, open checkouts and invoices, and the status of your flex pools.
Benefits.imageAlt: Simple and easy, sleek and modern dashboard to have a great overview of your business.

Features.subText: With these handy features, you barely have to worry about the less exciting tasks.

features.explanation: For assignments, more people can be hired than available spots, and additional people are listed as reserves. If someone hired drops out, reserves automatically move into the available spots.
When working with freelancers, they are automatically accepted for the jobs they apply to. This means you can call up the freelancers you like to work with more quickly and often.
If a shift remains unfilled for a long time, you have the option to automatically raise the rate of the shift. This allows you to quickly attract qualified candidates and ensure the shift is filled.

hrmSection.title: Plan. Track. Communicate.
hrmSection.subtitle: Xedular is the HRM app for dynamic teams. AI scheduling, time tracking via kiosk or phone, and built-in channels keep everything in sync in real time.

bullets.title: AI Scheduling
bullets.desc: Create rosters based on availability, skills, rules and demand.

bullets.title: Time Tracking (kiosk & mobile)
bullets.desc: Clock in/out via tablet, QR or app; auto-validation against the schedule.

bullets.title: Communication Channels
bullets.desc: Team channels with push notifications and email—managed in one place.

bullets.title: POS & API Integrations
bullets.desc: Connect POS and tools; sync revenue, hours and costs.

allInOne.title: All-in-one HRM platform
allInOne.intro: Everything you need to schedule, track time and keep teams informed—in a single workflow.

cards.title: AI Scheduling
cards.desc: Considers availability, skills, labor rules and peaks.

cards.title: Team Rosters & Swaps
cards.desc: Publish rosters, allow swaps and approve in one click.

cards.title: Time Tracking
cards.desc: Kiosk, QR and mobile clocking with automatic checks.

cards.title: Leave & Availability
cards.desc: Requests, codes and staffing impact at a glance.

cards.title: Communication Channels
cards.desc: Channels per team/location, push & email with analytics.

cards.title: Integrations & Webhooks
cards.desc: Connect POS, payroll and BI. Open REST API & webhooks.

plans.subText: Pay only for what you use. No hidden fees, no surprises.

starter.title: Starter
starter.desc: For small teams that want to get started quickly.

integrations.title: Works with your favorite tools
integrations.desc: Connect popular POS, accounting and BI. Sync revenue, hours and costs—no double entry.

storeSnippet.oneLiner: Schedule with AI, track time via kiosk or mobile, and reach your team via push and email—all in Xedular.

Benefits.elaboration: Download the app and sign up. You can register starting at 16 years old and work as a temp. From 18, you can also work as a freelancer. Once registered, you can choose from thousands of jobs in the app.

To improve your chances of acceptance, make sure your profile is complete and professional. Add a clear profile picture, fill out your information accurately, and describe your skills and experience in detail. References from previous employers can also help.

Benefits.subText: you can also choose weekly payments.
Benefits.elaboration: After submitting your worked hours, you'll receive (for now) your payments at the end of the month. Starting from February, you can also choose weekly payments. These payments will be transferred directly to your bank account.

Features.subText: Discover a world of opportunities as a job seeker on our platform. From creative projects to business tasks, here you will find your next success story. Join us and make your dreams come true!

features.elaboration: Find jobs that match your skills and interests in no time, without endless searching.
Manage your own schedule and work when it suits you, allowing you to better balance your work and private life.
Access a wide range of clients, from startups to large corporations, expanding your network and experience.
Communicate directly with us through the app or WhatsApp, allowing you to ask questions quickly, provide feedback, and finish your jobs.
Receive guaranteed payments for your work without hassle or delays.
Build a strong reputation by gathering positive reviews and feedback from satisfied clients, increasing your chances for future jobs.

PhoneHero.CVtekst: Sign up quickly with a CV?
PhoneHero.SubTekst: With Junter, you quickly discover paid shifts and gigs at trusted companies. Choose where and when you work, and get paid instantly.

junterPage.headText: We are a passionate group of people.
junterPage.subText: Our diversity and shared vision drive us to create innovative solutions that transform the way businesses and customers interact.

strategyPlan.elaboration: The establishment of Junter marks the beginning of an innovative journey. Our goal is to connect job seekers and businesses in a new way.
Various investment rounds for capital and network expansion. Growing further with resources and connections.
Junter expands into various European markets, allowing even more job seekers and businesses to benefit from our platform.
Our global launch brings Junter to the international market, enabling us to offer our services worldwide and make a greater impact.

people.subText1: Our people are our greatest asset. They bring expertise, passion, and dedication to everything they do.
people.subtext2: We are proud of our diverse and talented teams who collaborate to achieve great results. Together, we build a future centered on innovation and cooperation.

vacancies.headText: We're always looking for great people to join our team
vacancies.subText: Do you have a passion for innovation and a drive to make an impact? Join us and help us grow and succeed together.

vacancies.title: Account Manager
vacancies.description: As a Senior Account Manager, you will be responsible for managing key client accounts, developing strong relationships, and driving revenue growth. You will work closely with clients to understand their needs, provide tailored solutions, and ensure their satisfaction with our services.

vacancies.title: Global Marketing Manager
vacancies.description: The Global Marketing Manager will lead the development and execution of global marketing strategies to increase brand awareness and market share. You will manage a team of marketing professionals, oversee global campaigns, and work cross-functionally to achieve business objectives.

vacancies.title: Support Agent
vacancies.description: As a Support Agent, you are the first point of contact for both freelancers and companies. You provide assistance and resolve issues. You handle inquiries and ensure high customer satisfaction by providing timely and effective support.

contactPage.subText: Contact us today through the channel below and receive a response within 48 hours.

pricingPage.title: Pricing
pricingPage.headText: The best price for the right personnel
pricingPage.subText: At Junter, we believe in fairness and transparency. No hidden costs or fine print, just clear pricing so you always know what to expect.

features: Project-based work with a specific deliverable

pricingPage.SubTextCTA: Unsure between freelancers and temporary workers? Or do you need personal advice on what flexible labor can mean for your organization and the associated costs?

notfoundPage.subText: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.

verifyPage.title: Verify Identity
verifyPage.endingSentence: We will contact you as soon as possible after receiving the documents.
verifyPage.headText1: Thank you for filling out the registration form. To verify your company, we need the following documents:
verifyPage.headText2: Thank you for filling out the registration form. To verify your profile as a freelancer, we need the following documents:

requiredDocuments: A valid identification document (passport, ID card, or driver’s license, document number and photo may be blurred).
A document confirming your registered address, such as a proof of residence.
A copy of your bank card.
- A document confirming the provided address, such as an official letter with address and Chamber of Commerce number.
- A completed and signed direct debit authorization form, if applicable.
informationRequired: - First and last name of the contact person

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to Junter. We value your trust in us and take your privacy seriously. This privacy policy is intended to inform you about how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal data when you use our platform.

section1.heading: 1. Data We Collect
section1.text:
We collect various types of data to provide and improve our services.

Personal Data: First name, last name, date of birth, email address, phone number, address, National Insurance Number (NINo), VAT number, and bank account details (account number and sort code).
Professional Data: Work experience, skills, education, profile picture, and ratings.
Platform Usage: Information about your interactions with our platform, such as the services you offer or request, communication with companies, and your participation in projects.

section2.heading: 2. How We Use Your Data
section2.text:
We use your data for the following purposes:

Service Delivery: To enable you to find and accept projects, and to allow companies to book your services.
Communication: To contact you about your account, projects, and other related matters.
Platform Improvement: To analyze and improve our platform and services.
Legal Obligations: To comply with legal and regulatory requirements.

section3.heading: 3. Sharing Your Data
section3.text:
We only share your data with third parties when necessary to perform our services, such as:

Companies: To enable them to contact you and book your services.
Service Providers: To provide technical support and other necessary services for our platform.
Legal Authorities: If we are legally required to disclose your data.

section4.heading: 4. Data Security
section4.text: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, destruction, or alteration. Despite our efforts, we cannot fully guarantee the security of data transmission over the internet.

section5.heading: 5. Data Retention
section5.text: We do not retain your personal data longer than necessary for the purposes for which it was collected, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

section6.heading: 6. Your Rights
section6.text:
You have the right to:

Request access to your personal data.
Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
Request deletion of your personal data.
Request restriction of the processing of your data.
Object to the processing of your data.
Request data portability.
If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at support@junter.works.

section7.heading: 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section7.text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting a notice on our platform or by contacting you directly.

section8.heading: 8. Contact
section8.text: If you have any questions or comments about this privacy policy, please contact us at:

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to Junter. By using our platform, you agree to these terms and conditions. Please read these terms carefully before using our services.

sections.heading: 1. Definitions
sections.text:
Platform: The online environment of Junter, accessible via our website and/or mobile application.
Employee: An individual who registers on the platform to offer services to companies.
Company: An entity that registers on the platform to request services from employees.
User: Both employees and companies who use the platform.

sections.heading: 2. Registration and Account
sections.text:
Creating an Account: To use our platform, you must create an account by completing the registration process.
Information: You guarantee that all information provided by you is truthful, accurate, and up to date.
Security: You are responsible for keeping your account details and password confidential. We are not liable for any loss or damage resulting from your negligence in protecting this information.

sections.heading: 3. Use of the Platform
sections.text:
Permitted Use: You may only use our platform for legitimate purposes in accordance with these terms and applicable laws and regulations.
Prohibited Use: It is prohibited to use the platform for illegal activities, to send spam, or to compromise the security or integrity of the platform.

sections.heading: 4. Services and Payments
sections.text:
Offering Services: Employees can offer their services via the platform. Companies can book and use these services.
Payments: Payments for the provided services are processed through the platform. The exact payment terms and procedures are agreed upon separately between the employees and the company.
Service Fees: We reserve the right to charge service fees for using the platform. These fees will be clearly stated before a service is booked.

sections.heading: 5. Cancellations and Disputes
sections.text:
Cancellations: Cancellation terms for services are agreed upon separately between the employee and the company. We recommend having clear cancellation terms.
Disputes: Disputes between employees and companies should be resolved between the parties themselves. We offer support in disputes but are not responsible for the outcome.

sections.heading: 6. Liability
sections.text:
Indemnification: You agree to indemnify Junter from any liability, claims, and costs arising from your use of the platform.
Limitation of Liability: We are not liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages, or loss of profit or revenue resulting from your use of the platform.

sections.heading: 7. Intellectual Property
sections.text:
Ownership: All intellectual property rights related to the platform and its content are owned by Junter or its licensors.
Use: You may only use the content of the platform for personal and non-commercial purposes unless otherwise agreed.

sections.heading: 8. Termination
sections.text:
Termination by User: You may terminate your account at any time by contacting us.
Termination by Junter: We reserve the right to terminate your account or suspend your access to the platform if you violate these terms.

sections.heading: 9. Changes to the Terms
sections.text: We may amend these terms and conditions from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting a notice on our platform or by informing you directly. Your continued use of the platform after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the amended terms.

sections.heading: 10. Governing Law
sections.text: These terms and conditions are governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the Netherlands. Disputes arising from or related to these terms will be submitted to the competent courts in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions or comments, please contact us at:

inhoud: Welcome to Junter. These Terms and Conditions ("Terms", "Agreement") apply to your use of our services, products, and website at www.junter.eu. By using our Services, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you should not use our Services.
Client: The entity entering into a contract with the Company to receive Services.
Services: All products, services, and support provided by the Company.
Agreement: These Terms and any other terms agreed upon in writing between the Company and the Client.

subsecties.inhoud: The Company agrees to provide the Services as described in the agreed contract or order form. The scope, duration, and pricing of the Services will be specified in the contract or order form.

The Company reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue parts of the Services at any time, with or without notice, provided that such changes do not materially affect the quality of the Services delivered to the Client.
The Client agrees to pay the fees for the Services as specified in the contract or order form. All fees are non-refundable unless otherwise stated.
Invoices will be issued according to the payment schedule specified in the contract. Payment is due within 14 days from the invoice date unless otherwise agreed in writing.
Late payments may incur interest at a rate of 5.2% per month or the maximum rate allowed by law, whichever is lower. The Company reserves the right to suspend Services until full payment is received.

Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of any proprietary or confidential information disclosed during the term of this Agreement. Confidential information includes, but is not limited to, business strategies, financial information, and client data.
Neither party shall disclose the other party's confidential information to any third party without prior written consent, except as required by law.

All intellectual property rights related to the Services, including but not limited to software, content, and trademarks, are owned by the Company or its licensors. The Client is granted a non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the Services during the term of the Agreement.

The Client retains ownership of all data provided to the Company in connection with the Services. The Company is granted a license to use, reproduce, and modify the Client’s data solely for the purpose of delivering the Services.
The Company warrants that the Services will be performed in a professional and competent manner.
Except as expressly stated in these Terms, the Services are provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties of any kind, whether express or implied.

inhoud: To the maximum extent permitted by law, the Company shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether direct or indirect, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (i) your use of or inability to use the Services; (ii) any unauthorized access to or use of our servers and/or any personal information stored therein.

subsecties.inhoud: This Agreement enters into force on the effective date specified in the contract and remains in effect until terminated as set forth herein.
Either party may terminate this Agreement for any reason by providing 14 days’ written notice to the other party.

Either party may terminate this Agreement immediately if the other party breaches any material provision of this Agreement and fails to remedy such breach within 14 days of receiving written notice of the breach.
This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Netherlands, without regard to its conflict of laws principles.

Any disputes arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall be resolved through good faith negotiations between the parties. If the dispute cannot be resolved through negotiations, it shall be submitted to arbitration/mediation in London.
This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties and supersedes all prior agreements and understandings, whether written or oral, relating to its subject matter.
This Agreement may only be amended or modified by a written document signed by both parties.
If any provision of this Agreement is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
The failure of either party to enforce any right or provision of this Agreement shall not be deemed a waiver of such right or provision.
